age.Description: age of the participant at the time of recording

sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

pathology.Description: diagnosis of the patient who underwent neurosurgery

medianus_stimulation.Description: site of medianus somatosensory evoked potential stimulation

tibialis_stimulation.Description: site of tibialis somatosensory evoked potential stimulation

erb_sep.Description: peripheral erb somatosensory evoked potential stimulation

subcortical_sep.Description: peripheral subcortical somatosensory evoked potential stimulation
